channel.title: make on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in make on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-02
item.description: Google Soli Radar sees your intentions – and it’s less creepy and more helpful than you think (3 minute read) Google’s ATAP group recently unveiled its latest Soli Radar research project.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-01
item.description: TikTok expands maximum video length to 10 minutes (3 minute read) TikTok has expanded the maximum length for uploads to 10 minutes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-17
item.description: Nvidia’s AI-powered scaling makes old games look better without a huge performance hit (3 minute read) Nvidia’s latest game-ready driver includes a tool called Deep Learning Dynamic Super Resolution (DLDSR) that can make most games look sharper.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-01
item.description: Facebook’s Meta watch has a camera notch, according to first leaked image (2 minute read) Leaked images of Facebook’s smartwatch show a camera notch that is clearly visible when the watch’s screen is off.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-23
item.description: Brave’s nontracking search engine is now in beta (8 minute read) Brave’s search engine has been launched in global beta.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-18
item.description: Amazon is in talks to buy MGM for $9 billion (2 minute read) Amazon has reportedly offered $9 billion to purchase MGM, the film giant that owns a historic catalog of films, an array of production and distribution companies, and the content network Epix.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-28
item.description: Apple’s M2 chip has entered production and will ship as soon as July (2 minute read) Apple’s custom-designed M2 chips entered production this month.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-14
item.description: Google trained a trillion-parameter AI language model (5 minute read) Generally speaking, the more parameters a machine learning model has, the better it is at its task.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-31
item.description: Amazon acquires podcast network Wondery (1 minute read) Podcast network Wondery will soon become part of Amazon Music.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-18
item.description: Amazon Fresh grocery store in Los Angeles opens to the public (1 minute read) Amazon Fresh at Woodland Hills, Los Angeles is now open to the public from 7 AM to 10 PM PT daily.
